body_html: @shawnjhenry , why batch_size, and not a binary matrix that you use to zero out or do boolean switches over the tensors? I've usually implemented it as a sentinel value in the input data (0, usually), then forming the binary mask based on that. For any modifications to the data tensor, you just do a corresponding operation to the mask tensor.
